item.title: affad add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Because in the end, you wonâ€™t remember the time you spent working in the office or mowing your lawn. Climb that goddamn mountain." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: affad add a quote by Stanely Fish
item.description: "[T]he absolutely true...exists, and i know what it is. The problem is that you know too, and that we know different things, which puts us...armed with universal judgements that are irreconcilable, all dressed up and nowhere to go for authoritative adjudication." -- Stanely Fish

item.title: affad add a quote by Howard Thurman
item.description: "...[A] strange necessity has been laid upon me to devote my life to the central concern that transcends the walls that divide and would achieve in literal fact what is experienced as literal truth: human life is one and all men are members of one another. And this insight is spiritual and it is the hard core of religious experience." -- Howard Thurman
